title: The Child Emperor - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Calm Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Coming of Age   Court Official   Empires   Eunuch   Leadership   Male Protagonist   Politics   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secret Organizations   Sibling Rivalry   Wars
author: Cold Glamor   冰临神下
description: Three Emperors have died in quick succession. The prince whom nobody had taken notice of unexpectedly succeeds to the throne. He is quickly plunged into layers upon layers of danger. The Empress Dowager dislikes him, wishing to install a younger, more obedient Emperor. His half-brother dislikes him, accusing him of stealing the throne that is rightfully his. The palace attendants and servants dislike him, believing that he is not a true Emperor. The Child Emperor must save himself.>
